name: part_006
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ4周年LIVE】ちょこから感謝を込めて4周年3ＤLIVE‼【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [XKBbbN7M44E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Baby Q' (DeviQ) by the 'Devil Group' (Yuzuki Choco, Tokoyami Towa, and La+ Darknesss).
MC section featuring Yuzuki Choco, Tokoyami Towa, and La+ Darknesss discussing their song choice and performance.

subtitles.original: しらじら肌は
subtitles.english: My pure white skin

subtitles.original: 舞っちゃうなー！
subtitles.english: Is dancing!

subtitles.original: デビデビデビきゅー デビきゅーと
subtitles.english: Devi-devi-devi-Q, with a Devi-Q

subtitles.original: クラクラさせるわ 君のこと
subtitles.english: I'll make you dizzy for me

subtitles.original: デビデビデビきゅー デビきゅーと
subtitles.english: Devi-devi-devi-Q, with a Devi-Q

subtitles.original: メラメラ燃える この心
subtitles.english: This heart is burning bright

subtitles.original: デビデビデビきゅー デビきゅーと
subtitles.english: Devi-devi-devi-Q, with a Devi-Q

subtitles.original: 君を振り向かせるためなら
subtitles.english: If it's to make you look my way

subtitles.original: デビきゅー デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q, Devi-Q

subtitles.original: 悪魔にだって変身するわ
subtitles.english: I'll even transform into a devil

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅー
subtitles.english: Devi-Q

subtitles.original: デビきゅーと！
subtitles.english: With a Devi-Q!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！
subtitles.english: All right! And with that!

subtitles.original: チョコさん4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Choco-san, congrats on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！すごい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! That was amazing!

subtitles.original: あれ？今日なんか清楚じゃない？トワ様。
subtitles.english: Wait, wasn't Towa-sama kind of pure today?

subtitles.original: ええ、可愛いでしょ？ほら。
subtitles.english: Eh? Wasn't I cute? Look.

subtitles.original: 珍しかったっすね、なんかトワ様がこういう曲歌うの。
subtitles.english: It was rare for Towa-sama to sing a song like this.

subtitles.original: あのさ、なんでこの曲選んだの？
subtitles.english: Hey, why did you choose this song?

subtitles.original: いや、これ悪魔組でなんか歌いたいなって思って。
subtitles.english: Well, I wanted to sing something with the Devil Group.

subtitles.original: 最初可愛い曲かかっこいい曲かでめちゃめちゃ迷ったのチョコ。
subtitles.english: I was really torn between a cute song or a cool one.

subtitles.original: このメンバーだし、かっこいい曲も絶対合うけど、
subtitles.english: With these members, a cool song would definitely fit,

subtitles.original: でも絶対トワ様歌わない可愛い曲を、
subtitles.english: but I thought I'd invite you to sing a cute song

subtitles.original: なんか自分じゃ歌いにくそうだからチョコがお誘いして一緒に歌いたいなーって思って。
subtitles.english: that Towa-sama usually wouldn't sing on her own.

subtitles.original: えー、マジで嫌だったマジで。何がデビきゅーだよ！
subtitles.english: Ugh, I seriously hated it. What's with 'Devi-Q'!

subtitles.original: トワ様チョコ先から誘われて、普通に「いいよ」って言った？ラプラスは。
subtitles.english: Towa-sama was invited by Choco-sen and just said 'okay.' How about you, La+?

subtitles.original: あ、もちろん！即攻返してました。
subtitles.english: Oh, of course! I replied instantly.

subtitles.original: 「いいですね！」って。ういー！みたいな。
subtitles.english: I was like, 'Sounds good!' or 'Yay!'

subtitles.original: トワは一回渋ったよね？
subtitles.english: Towa, you hesitated at first, didn't you?

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと、本当にこれでいいの？この曲でいいの？みたいな。
subtitles.english: Well, I was a bit like, 'Are you really sure? Is this song okay?'

subtitles.original: いやでも、デビルだからぴったりですよ！
subtitles.english: But it's perfect because we're devils!

subtitles.original: そうそうそう、デビルで多分選んでくれてて、一緒に歌ってくれてるのはわかったから。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I understood that you chose it with 'devil' in mind and sang it with us.

subtitles.original: しかもチョコ先のね、記念だから、いや、歌うか。
subtitles.english: Besides, it's Choco-sen's anniversary, so I had to sing it.

subtitles.original: やばー！なんかかっこよかったし可愛かったですね。
subtitles.english: Wow! It was both cool and cute.

subtitles.original: え、そうなの？そうなの？
subtitles.english: Oh, really? Is that so?

subtitles.original: 本当にチョコこれ欲望のままで選んだメンツだからね。
subtitles.english: I really chose this lineup based purely on my own desires.

subtitles.original: 初めて歌ってめちゃめちゃチョコニヤニヤしちゃった。ありがとー！
subtitles.english: It was our first time singing together, and I couldn't stop grinning. Thank you!

subtitles.original: チョコ先とトワ様初めてだから、すごい。
subtitles.english: It was the first time for Choco-sen and Towa-sama, so that's amazing.

subtitles.original: え、てか3人も初めてですよね？
subtitles.english: Wait, it's the first time for all three of us, right?

subtitles.original: そうなの。なんかここシナジーあるかな。
subtitles.english: That's right. I wonder if there's synergy here.

subtitles.original: デビル、デビル、デビル...
subtitles.english: Devil, devil, devil...

subtitles.original: でもこの中だったら吾輩が一番角でかいし、一番偉い。
subtitles.english: But among us, I have the biggest horns, so I'm the highest rank.

subtitles.original: え、位でいうとどうなの？
subtitles.english: Eh? What about our actual ranks?

subtitles.original: 位でいうと、トワはチョコ先の下だよ。
subtitles.english: Rank-wise, Towa is below Choco-sen.

subtitles.original: だって小悪魔だから。チョコ先の方がやっぱ大悪魔だから。
subtitles.english: Because I'm a low-ranking devil. Choco-sen is an archdevil.

subtitles.original: や、でもじゃあそんな悪魔の吾輩の方が角でかいから吾輩が一番偉いから。
subtitles.english: Well, even so, I have bigger horns, so I'm the most important one.

subtitles.original: チョコ先一番...ちんまりしてるしね。一番下かな。吾輩が一番！
subtitles.english: Choco-sen is the smallest... so she's the lowest. I'm number one!

subtitles.original: はいということで！
subtitles.english: All right, moving on!

subtitles.original: なんで！
subtitles.english: Why?!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ最後にチョコからお二人に、お願いがあるの。
subtitles.english: Okay, finally, Choco has a request for both of you.

subtitles.original: なーに？なーに？
subtitles.english: What is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: 悪魔組だから、やっぱり皆様を誘惑したいなーって思って、
subtitles.english: Since we're the Devil Group, I'd like to seduce everyone,

subtitles.original: 3人で誘惑ポーズして終わりたいなーなんて思うんだけど。
subtitles.english: so I was thinking we could all strike a seductive pose together.

subtitles.original: 誘惑ポーズね。ポーズだったらまあ、まあまあまあ。
subtitles.english: A seductive pose, huh? If it's just a pose, then I guess it's fine.

subtitles.original: え、本当ですか？トワ様いいんですか？
subtitles.english: Oh, really? Is that okay with you, Towa-sama?

subtitles.original: いいよ、ちょっと我慢してやろうかなって思って。
subtitles.english: Sure, I'll put up with it just this once.

subtitles.original: 足、足、足！チョコ先生ナイスすぎ今。
subtitles.english: Legs, legs, legs! Choco-sensei, you look great right now.

subtitles.original: え、いいかな？いいかな？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Is it really okay?

subtitles.original: あ、まあじゃあ、誘惑ポーズですよね。
subtitles.english: Well then, it's the seductive pose, right?

subtitles.original: 誘惑ポーズ行きますよ。カメラさん寄って寄って。
subtitles.english: Here comes the seductive pose. Camera, zoom in, zoom in!

subtitles.original: せーのでやりますよ、せーので。
subtitles.english: Let's do it on the count of three.

subtitles.original: 渾身のやつ、渾身のやつ！
subtitles.english: Give it your all, give it your all!

subtitles.original: 渾身の一発。
subtitles.english: Our very best one.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: もうやだー！トワ様かっこよすぎて！
subtitles.english: Oh, no! Towa-sama is just too cool!

subtitles.original: え、終わり？
subtitles.english: Wait, is that it?
